Header.title: Traize
Header.paragraph: We are developing an intelligent operating system for enterprise knowledge, connecting talent, projects, and expertise to unlock your organization's full potential.

About.paragraph: Traize is crafting the future of enterprise knowledge. Our platform provides organizations with the intelligence to understand internal capabilities, optimize resources, and cultivate continuous learning. We turn complex data into actionable expertise, making your hidden strengths visible and accessible.

Vision.statement: We envision a future where organizations effortlessly connect their collective intelligence – linking every talent, project, and skill – to become truly intelligent, adaptive, and limitless.

Approach.paragraph: Discover how Traize transforms enterprise knowledge through intelligent systems and data-driven insights.

Services.name: Connected Intelligence
Services.text: Seamlessly map organizational knowledge and expertise relationships at scale for unparalleled clarity.

Services.name: Adaptive Organizations
Services.text: Empower companies to learn, evolve, and respond to change with the collective agility of their workforce

Services.name: Limitless Potential
Services.text: Unleash unprecedented innovation and growth by transcending traditional organizational boundaries.

Team.name: Raphael Sauer
Team.description: Raphael leads Traize's business strategy and partnerships. Drawing on a background in consulting and an MSc in Organization & Innovation from Copenhagen, he expertly bridges our advanced research with market needs. He focuses on strategic relationships with key partners and scaling our go-to-market initiatives, ensuring Traize's solutions deliver value to enterprises.

Team.name: Lukas Bierling
Team.description: Lukas leads our research initiatives and core engineering architecture. Currently, a MSc AI  student in Amsterdam he focuses on information retrieval and autonomous agents. With over four years of experience in Machine Learning Engineering and Research, he develops the foundational algorithms and infrastructure that power Traize's knowledge mapping capabilities.

Team.name: Adrian Henkel
Team.description: Adrian, with an MSc in Bioinformatics from TUM, is the architect of Traize's technical infrastructure. He is our lead LLM Engineer, implementing all relevant generative components and agentic AI workflows.  His expertise ensures the seamless integration and high performance of LLMs, transforming complex enterprise knowledge into intelligent insights at scale.

Team.name: Theo Rabe
Team.description: Theo is the driving force behind Traize's user experience and brand identity. With his dual background in business (B.Sc.) and the creative industries (M.A.), he builds the crucial bridge between business logic and intuitive design. He is responsible for translating the vision of Traize into a product and a brand that delight users, while simultaneously ensuring the company's economic success.
